snippet.title: Sonic 1 Definitive (SHC '21 Demo) :: Walkthrough (1080p/60fps)
snippet.description:
Sonic 1 Definitive is a Rom Hack of Sonic The Hedgehog created by the RadiantNexus Team, featured as an entry to this years Sonic Hacking Contest!

The Rom Hack here seeks to reimagine Sonic 1 by rearranging levels, remixing music, adding features from future games, and re-adding scrapped ideas in new and interesting ways.

✪ Major Features ✪
- 3 acts of reimagined level design, including one act that has yet to be fully reimagined in any other hack.
- A miniboss.
- Massive art overhaul all over the place.
- Music made by ProjectFM and MechaKnuckles.
- Menus!
- A custom splash screen.
- Massive engine overhauls as well, including the Sonic 3 level layout format for massive levels, and the Sonic 3 object manager to go alongside this.

= = = = = = = = = =

✪ Sonic Hacking Contest 2021 Playlist ✪
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTbxUzzstrYeGbD2OjzvPnzulIChaBuwd

#SonicHacks #Sonic1Hacks #SHC2021
Link is here!
By RadiantNexus Team:
https://shc.zone/entries/contest2021/552
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
#Jaypin88 #SapphireSquad #RoadTo100k💎
Thanks for watching! Be sure to hit the like button, share amongst others, most certainly subscribe, and hit the bell to be notified when new video's come out!
